translation_english: I can / I am able to
example_sentence_english: I can come.
You can do it.
He can come.
We can wait.
You (plural) can enter.
They can speak.

translation_english: I could / I was able to
example_sentence_english: I could do it.
You could run faster.
She could come.
We could wait.
You (plural) could help.
They could go out.
